title: Percolation Inequalities and Decision Trees
abstract:
The use of decision trees for percolation inequalities started with the
celebrated O'Donnell--Saks--Schramm--Servedio (OSSS) inequality. We prove
decision tree generalizations of the Harris--Kleitman (HK), van den
Berg--Kesten (vdBK), and other inequalities. These inequalities are then
applied to estimate the connection probabilities in Bernoulli bond percolation
on general graphs.
